title: conferred on me by section 67(5) of the Credit Institutions (Stabilisation) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the General Government Secured Borrowings
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the General Government Secured Borrowings 

Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited general government secured borrowing order 2020

title: conferred on me by section 67(5) of the Credit Institutions (Stabilisation) Act
heading: 2. The bodies listed in the Schedule are prescribed as bodies to which
text_raw:
2. The bodies listed in the Schedule are prescribed as bodies to which 
section 67 of the Credit Institutions (Stabilisation) Act 2010 (No. 36 of 2010) 
applies. 

The General Government Secured Borrowings (No. 2) Order 2018 (S.I. No. 522 
of 2018) is revoked. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [750] 3

Media
